duties_responsibilities.duty: Installation, configuration, administration, and deployment of Operating Systems (Windows 10, Android, Linux)
Utilizing imaging tools and deployment techniques, especially Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT)
Programming knowledge and hands-on experience in PowerShell, Python, C#, VBScript, and Batch scripting
Experience in SQL Server and database management
Utilization of device management software, including BigFix, Bomgar, Cylance, Esper, and ConnectWise

Expertise in working with Point of Sale (POS) hardware, software, and peripherals from various vendors such as PAREpson, Dell, QUXenial, Aloha, NCR, Verifone, Ingenico, FreedomPay, Aurus, GPI, and Delphi
Proficiency in network configuration for Ethernet and Wi-Fi setups
Excellent teamwork skills and ability to collaborate effectively with colleagues
Positive attitude and inclination to contribute to a harmonious work environment
Flexibility to work from the office location
Eagerness to learn and stay updated with the latest IT trends and technologies
Willingness to travel to various sites as needed to provide on-site support
